name: Frog's Throne
description:
This is my submission for the Digest South 2016 Game Jam. The theme was "Game of Frogs". I hope the game conforms to that theme nicely. It's a first person shooter. Kill all of the frogs to progress. It's as simple as that!

Made with Unity

Programming/Design - Jonathan Belaire

Music - Phillip Taylor Crews

Art - Kitty Senabandith
